name: DreamDancer
description:
This is my little contribution to the competition. at no point does this game seek to be a real challenge, just sit back and enjoy the ride ^^

Controls:

D-pad: WASD or Arrows

B- button: K

A-button: J

Start:  Enter

*Gamepad Is Supported*

Note: If you're using an xbox gamepad keep in mind that B and A buttons are switched,this  is to follow the classic button mapping of a GameBoy
